data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Picea abies (Norway spruce) compiled from tree samples TOTHUM

Exposition W, Slope 30 deg, Geology: Hangschutt, Silikat, Tree line 850 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 75%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 95%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Aconito-Piceetum, Film number: 529A
